name: Localnomad London
tag_list: travel, vacation-rental, holiday, apartment-rental, property, apartments, short-term, long-term, accommodation, travel-agency
overview:
Localnomad London is a company that forms part of the Localnomad group. We are a tourism rental agency offering short to long stays, from days to months. Our London subsidiary offers a personal and guaranteed service to both its clients and property owners.

For those planning a holiday or business trip, count on our wide range of products, from apartments and houses, to studios and aparthotels. Our properties are all furnished and equipped and are available via our website with on-line reservation and exclusive offers.

Localnomad London provides apartments in London, in areas such as Kensington and Chelsea, The City and near attractions such as the London Eye, Buckingham Palace, London Bridge, and Western Europe’s tallest building- The Shard. We provide our property owners with security and the best marketing solutions in to maximize the profitability of each rental.

Visit our website, www.localnomad-london.com, send us an email at booking@localnomad.com or call us on one of our international numbers.

Follow us on: @localnomad | Localnomad on Facebook | Localnomad on Google+
